issue.message: Do not treat position as fixed; only use immediately and call `holder.getAdapterPosition()` to look it up later
issue.errorLine1: public void onBindViewHolder(final CatHolder holder, int position) {

issue.message: Calling `Canvas.getHeight()` is usually wrong; you should be calling `getBounds().getHeight()` instead
Calling `Canvas.getWidth()` is usually wrong; you should be calling `getBounds().getWidth()` instead
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead
Reflective access to getBitmap, which is not part of the public SDK and therefore likely to change in future Android releases
